s3compatb3_bucket_linked: ${user} linked the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage bucket ${bucket} to ${node}
s3compatb3_bucket_unlinked: ${user} unselected the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compatb3_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compatb3_file_removed: ${user} removed ${path} in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compatb3_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compatb3_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
s3compatb3_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage addon for ${node}
s3compatb3_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage addon for ${node}
s3compatb3_node_deauthorized_no_user: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage addon for ${node} deauthorized
